short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For the activity-goers and fun-lovers! Quickly find events in your local area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EventBuzz!
This lightweight application utilizes SerpAPI to grab events from Google Events and display them in an easily digestible format :) 
- Search for Events, Festivals, Parties, Hackathons, Concerts and more!
- Search by Event, Location, Group, Venue, what have you!
- Easily access directions, your ticket link, and more information. 
- Save events as "Favorites" by utilizing local storage. 
- Sort your events by Date
